It's in English (with fake Russian accents). Installs and plays fine, thanks.

This game is essentially the poor man's Call of Duty, but could be worse. Considering it's low budget, it's solid entertainment for those that can't get enough of WWII shooters. I wish they did a bit better work with the aiming.
